nodes.text: The LOS-0 sabotage probe droid was a probe droid model produced by Galactic Solutions Industries as a sabotage droid in starfighter combat. Once attached to an enemy starship, the LOS-0 rapidly disabled the ship's thrusters and other systems while also dealing minor hull damage in the process. The probe droid was originally used primarily by bounty hunters and law enforcement personnel to cripple fleeing starships.
